评论详情: I bought this as a part of a Ninja costume but it is so much better than expected! I literally, don't want to take it off. It's stretchy, not too warm, has thumb holes, super flattering. Definitely a winner. I could pair this with athletic pants, jeans, or even a skirt. Add a vest...and there's my whole winter wardrobe. Love, love, love.

I normally wear a size 12 or a large in women's clothing so I purchased the Large, thinking I would just be wearing this as a layer piece in the winter (gets below 0 here). I was so pleasantly surprised. The fabric was very soft, not like that shiny polyester material. It even has pockets on the sides which I didn't realize it had. Its super cute and not tight; almost too big actually. I could wear a layer beneath it.
This shirt is great for layering. My only issue was that it has pockets, which I normally love, but on this top it adds a little bulk. Don t let that deter you tho, it’s a decent top
Love this top, super soft, length falls at hips not the top of your jeans,  hood stays in place,  doesn't pill after several washes.
I purchased these to wear during the summer as every place I go the air condition is hyped up. Easy to put on and very fashionable.

I have several other athletic tops by this brand (Zengjo) and expected this one to be a similar material -- kind of a silky-feeling polyester. It isn't. At first that disappointed me, but I've gotten over it and I really like the cotton-feel of this top. It's very light weight but soft and cozy. I don't see myself using the hood, honestly, but I dig the high neckline; it offers a bit more sun protection for my chest area. The blue color is great (midway between a navy and a royal). For less than $20, this shirt is great and I immediately bought another in pink.  I'm 5'4", 157 lbs, wear a 40D bra; bust 42, waist 35, hips 43, typically wear between a 12 and a 14 in numbered tops. In this shirt, I bought the large. Fits well -- not too clingy, not baggy. NOTE: I am also short-torsoed and usually buy petite tops (which wasn't an option here), and this shirt hit right at crotch level or slightly above. If you have a normal-length torso, I think it will hit a little higher on the hips.
Beautiful & soft but runs really big I’m 5’8 155lbs

Sort of like the material because it’s stretchy but it also has that soft texture to me that doesn’t seem right. Maybe because it causes a clingy look or seems to get dirty quickly and picks up lint easily.  The fit is NOT flattering. I like a trim cut shirt that emphasizes the right areas. This shirt doesn’t do that. The sleeves are too long, and the neck has way too much excess material. Think it’s probably suppose to help keep you warm but it makes you look like a turtle with its head stuck in the shell. Read about the pockets and thought they would be a nice feature but they make it fit and look bulky in the mid section. Again not flattering, at least not for me, but if you like your shirts loose in the middle and like front pockets to put your hands or keys, etc. this will work for you.  I do like that it’s pretty plain with no visible annoying logo or brand on it. Not the worst shirt I ever bought but definitely not the best. It’s also a bit heavier than I like. Was looking for a lightweight, wicking, tech type of material this is more…idk. It is comfortable enough so might wear it around the house or underneath a light jacket when I know I won’t take my jacket off but it won’t be in my gym shirt rotation.

Got medium, and its may favorite piece of clothing ever. Got a small for different styling. Got 2 more mediums because I love it so much and they are way smaller. Which one is mislabeled? It's a real shame, because I really like this hoodie.

I wear these type tops at work and they are light and dry quickly. They have 2 hand-sized pockets that make this particular style better than the rest. They have thumb  slits to keep your sleeves in place while layering on a sweater to jacket. Wish they had more colors because I wear these at work every day
Love the fabric but it runs small. Size up if you don’t want it super fitting
Love it, will definitely buy more in other colors.
fits great very flattering soft will buy more in different colors.
The medium fit was too snug on me a the pockets don’t lie flat.
I was concerned with how thick the material is but I wasn't over heated at all.  Also the hood is bigger than it looks in the pictures which i also like. It's very long and stretchy. Yeah i like it.
Amazing fit and feel
Packaging less than desired and is a return item unfortunately from someone. Love the thumb whole on wrist. Elegant!
I like the comfortable fit, the nice length, and especially the softness of the material. It's a great top to wear all the time, in and out!

Perfect material for outdoors and indoor activities. Perfect fit, comfortable, and durable, not too heavy or too light, easy to move around. I keep coming back to buy another color and another. If you’re active like me it’s definitely a must have.

评论概述: Black material that does not catch pet hair
评论详情: Finally, a material that does not catch pet hair. I prefer black clothing but usually regret buying them. It is a nice light weight material good for when I go walking in colder weather. I like the thumb holes.
Just as described - soft and true navy. Definitely recommend it.
Fit my wife exactly the way I was hoping feels great.

Perfect workout top for cooler days. The fabric is a little clingy but very stretchy. The neck felt a little constricting but I'm not use to working out in tops with hoods. That's probably something I can get used to.  The sleeves are a little long but not a deal breaker. If you are between sizes I would size up just for the fact that if you have any back fat rolls from your sports bra the fabric will cling to it.
I really like this hoodie! I use it for strength training workouts. Looks nice and it’s breathable. I was comfortable and it can also be worn out of the gym.

The pockets are perfect. Fit and feel perfect. I’m so in love with these shirts I own 6 now. They wash well and do not fade. I work as an archaeological technician over summers and they are the most comfortable thing ever while outdoors during mosquito season, chilly mornings, hiking and having to squat up and down during surveys. My go to every work day because the pockets are functional and I can wear my safety vests without breaking a sweat!
Absolutely loving this top. Thinking of buying in more colors

5'7" 120 lbs size small fits well while still loose around the chest and stomach for working out. Arms are a bit longer than expected, but fit perfectly when I have my thumbs through the holes. The hood fits all the way over my head without feeling overly tight even when my hair is up. The best part - it's long enough that I can raise my arms and bend over without it riding up, even with my long torso. Will buy more in the future!
The material is soft and flexible. But it just fits so weird around the arm and the way the kangaroo pockets are aligned around the tummy area , makes me look like I’m pregnant
This fashionable hoodie fits like a glove with fabric that is soft to the touch. Great item to dress up or down. I love it

I LOVE soft, comfy sweatshirts, and this is my absolute favorite. It’s not too heavy to wear when there’s just a chill in the air, and it’s perfect for layering on colder days. I’ve had it for maybe like a year now, too, and it still looks brand new despite being worn a LOT (and is still flattering even though I’ve put on those pandemic pounds).

评论概述: brought xlg alittle big for my frame but love it

评论概述: Super soft, breathable perfect summer hoodie
评论详情: I live on the Northern California Coast, and even though it's summer I often still need an extra layer when I'm outside in the morning or late evening. This hoodie fits the bill. It's super soft, breathable, and layers well with a tank, a t-shirt and a flannel shirt for warmth during chilly evenings or mornings. Another plus is that it has thumb holes too!
Fit is nice,  true for a bit of a voluptuous figure

I'm usually large and got it extra large I have to return it was too big. I will exchange it for a large its really nice love the style super comfortable with  working pockets I like the high neck collar especially when exercising I hate when people can see down your shirt

Love this item but the HOT PINK is more of an orange red. Nothing pink about it. Material, texture, fitting and quality -A ++. The blue is beautiful!! I'm 200 lbs and an X large hangs perfectly on me.
The fit isn’t flattering, and the fabric feels cheap. I’ve had tops with similar hoods before, but I could never get this one to lay right. It’s fairly comfortable but that’s all it has going for it.
Flattering, great quality and for a sliver of what you’d pay for other brands!
Love the material, I bought a xl it fit perfectly, I'm 170 5'2, can't wait to work out in it
